## March 31 - Cezar Chavez Day

![](images/cezar-chavez.png){fig-alt="A black-and-white photo of farm-worker strike marchers. Two people hold round signs reading ‘HUELGA’ (strike) above a black eagle symbol and ‘NFWA’ (National Farm Workers Association). In the foreground, César Chávez walks with his head slightly down while other marchers crowd behind him."}

If you are interested in reading about the history of the labor movement, this
is a great article: [Ceasar Chavez and the Organized Labor Movement](https://americanexperience.si.edu/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Ceasar-Chavez-and-the-Organized-Labor-Movement.pdf)
